doc:
Michael Rennie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Rennie 0 Michael Rennie (born Eric Alexander Rennie; 25 August 1909 – 10 June 1971) was a British film, television and stage actor, perhaps best remembered for his starring role as the space visitor Klaatu in the science fiction film The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951). In a career spanning more than 30 years, Rennie appeared in more than 50 films and in several American television series. Michael_Rennie ( born Eric_Alexander_Rennie ; 25_August_1909 – 10_June_1971 ) was a_British_film_,_television_and_stage_actor , perhaps_best_remembered for his_starring_role as the_space_visitor_Klaatu in the_science_fiction_film The_Day the_Earth_Stood Still ( 1951 ) . In a_career spanning more_than_30_years , Rennie appeared in more_than_50_films and in several_American_television_series .
